name: Batiste Light Dry Shampoo, Mellow Melon, Invisible Finish, Refresh Hair & Absorb Oil Between Washes, 3.81 Oz.
short_description: 3.81 oz. can of Batiste Light Dry Shampoo with a subtle scent, lightweight feel, and invisible finish
Lightly scented; Mellow Melon fragrance keeps things delicately fresh
Features an airy formula that feels lightweight on hair and scalp; instantly refreshes hair without feeling like there’s tons of product in it
Invisible, matte finish for an easy, clean, and discreet application; this sheer dry shampoo spray won’t leave any visible white powder or heavy, gritty residue behind
Great for all hair types; recommended for normal to dry hair and sensitive scalp types
product_description: The revitalizing formula of Batiste Light Mellow Melon Dry Shampoo uplifts locks with a subtle scent, lightweight feel, and invisible finish. So, go on. Run your fingers through your clean-looking hair without a trace of powdery white tint left behind. A holy grail dry shampoo for women with sensitive scalps, Batiste Light helps you attain undeniable results. Watch as the lightweight aerosol mist gently removes oil and grease, haloing your hair with a sheer, invisible matte finish. Even in the final hours before wash day, Mellow Melon’s soft, delicate scent blends florals with a touch of creamy melon that’s just right for day or night. Simply shake the can, section your hair, and spray as much as you want 12 inches from your roots. Massage it into the roots of your hair, then, style. With Batiste Light Dry shampoo, hair and heart become eternally fresh and floaty, free of heavy residues, odors, and bad hair days.

name: Dry Shampoo Spray for Women & Men, Oil Control and Volumizing Dry Shampoo, Instant Refresh Non-Greasy, Nourishes Hair Roots, 7.61 oz
short_description: Dry Shampoo Spray: Dry shampoo spray effectively absorbs excess oil from the roots and scalp, no rinsing is required, just a simple spray can create fresh, bouncy hairstyle and say goodbye to oily, flat hair

Refreshing and Non-Greasy: Volumizing dry shampoo crafted with natural rice starch, it has a light and delicate texture that effectively absorbs oil without leaving a sticky residue, creating a fresh and voluminous hairstyle

Gentle Formula: Dry shampoo spray is made with a high-quality formula, safe and gentle, it effectively protects scalp health and nourishes hair while quickly cleansing; vegan and cruelty-free, suitable for all hair types

How to Use: Shake well before use, hold about 6-8 inches away and spray evenly on your hair, wait a moment for absorption, then gently comb through hair with your fingers, the light white powder will gradually dissipate, and reveal voluminous hair
Convenient Design: The dry shampoo features a portable spray design for easy use, easily fitting into a backpack, handbag, or suitcase, allowing you to maintain voluminous hair anytime, anywhere

name: SGX NYC Dry Touch Volumizing Dry Shampoo - Paraben Free, Vegan Dry Shampoo Spray Absorbs Excess Oil - Fresh and Bouncy Hair with No Residue - 6.5 oz
short_description: SECOND DAY HAIR SAVIOR. This is our best dry shampoo spray for volume! Effortlessly refreshes hair so you can enjoy an extra day of freshly washed hair feeling.

VOLUMIZE AND REFRESH. These NYC stylist-developed formula contains special natural ingredients to boost volume. Sea botanicals cleanse build-up and oil while bamboo fibers add bounce, volume, and texture to your hair.

INSTANT BOUNCE FOR NON WASH DAYS. Absorbs excess oil between showers and adds oomph between showers ...no one will ever know if you skip one (or two). For those flat & fine hair or with an active lifestyle and “get up and go” attitude.

REFRESHING SCENT. Our scented dry shampoo is the perfect styling product, it brushes through invisibly, leaving no residue and an indulgent yet refreshing scent. The jasmine and fig leaf scent is green and refreshing to your senses and your hair.
ALL THE BENEFITS, NONE OF THE NASTIES. This sulfate free dry shampoo spray is paraben free, mineral oil free, and vegan. Our products are never tested on animals, so they are also cruelty free.
product_description: Experience an instant hair transformation with SGX NYC Volumizing Dry Shampoo. This stylist-developed formula from the streets of NYC is designed to cater to those with an active lifestyle and a get-up-and-go attitude. It refreshes your hair instantly, making it ideal for days when it feels flat and oily. The shampoo is equipped with cleansing powders that effectively absorb excess oils between your showers, leaving your hair with a renewed, clean feeling.

name: Odele Dry Shampoo, Oil-Absorbing Powder to Revive Volume for All Hair Types & Textures, 1 oz
short_description: OIL ABSORBING, VOLUME-REVIVING, SHOWER-EXTENDING MAGIC – Our versatile, award-winning dry shampoo absorbs oil and sweat, adds volume, revives styles and helps promote scalp health

POWERFUL INGREDIENTS – This plant-based powder is packed with arrowroot + rice to give your hair oompf while plant proteins give your scalp some love. Algae, Green Microalgae, and Lavender help reduce scalp dryness and itchiness
BENEFITS – Third party test results show 2x more volume for fuller looking hair. *Individual Results may vary

HOW TO USE – This translucent powder is suited for all hair types and textures. Simply apply at roots, massage in + pretend you just showered. We recommend storing this product away from excess humidity
PEACE OF MIND – Dermatologist-tested and made without SLS or SLES sulfates, formaldehyde, phthalates, parabens, or synthetic fragrances. All Odele products are color-safe, vegan and cruelty-free
WE’RE ODELE – Clean, accessible, high-performance hair care for all. Our award-winning products deliver key benefits sought by every hair type + texture for every age and gender

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo | Non-Aerosol Powder for Oily Roots | Detoxifying Dry Shampoo for All Hair Types | Vegan & Cruelty Free | 1.7 oz.
short_description: DETOXIFYING CHARCOAL POWER: Binchotan Charcoal draws out impurities and buildup from the scalp, creating a clean foundation for healthy hair.
OIL-ABSORBING STARCH COMPLEX: A blend of Clay, Tapioca, and Rice Starches absorbs excess oil at the roots to refreshes hair to extend style longevity.
BIOTIN FOR STRONGER HAIR: Biotin delivers essential nutrients to support hair strength and elasticity, which helps maintain healthy-looking strands.
SCALP-BALANCING WITCH HAZEL: Our Witch Hazel and Bamboo Extract Blend helps normalize oil production, promoting a balanced scalp and reducing greasy buildup.
6-FREE CLEAN, VEGAN FORMULA: 99% naturally derived; free of sulfates, silicones, parabens, phthalates, DEA, and artificial dyes; vegan and Leaping Bunny certified cruelty free.

name: Batiste Sweat Activated Dry Shampoo, Neutralizes Odor for Up to 24 Hours & Prevents Sweat Buildup in Hair, Waterless Shampoo, 3.81 Oz
short_description: One 3.81 oz. can of Batiste Sweat Activated Dry Shampoo with sweat absorbing technology; upon sweating, invisible scent capsules left in the hair pop to release a burst of irresistible fragrance on demand
Up to 24 hours of freshness; freshly scented with the aroma of a sun-drenched orchard filled with crisp green apple, succulent pineapple, and subtly sweet, lightly floral pear and nectarine
Refresh with benefits; get all the perks of regular dry shampoo spray, plus advanced hair care tech that activates when you need it most
Targets excess oil and grease at the roots; leaves hair smelling and looking clean between washes; use as an after workout hair refresher to keep the freshness going strong
Effective for all hair types and perfect for the person on the go
product_description: Meet Batiste Sweat Activated Dry Shampoo, the latest game-changer from the Batiste dry shampoo fam. If you're always on the go, hitting the gym, or just living that nonstop life, this one's for you! It isn't just your regular dry shampoo that absorbs oil. Here’s how it works: tiny invisible capsules sit on your hair, waiting to be activated. When sweat starts, the capsules pop, releasing a burst of fragrance that gives you freshness for up to 24 hours. It’s the future of hair care—a future where sweat and odor don’t stand a chance. Use the Batiste Sweat Activated dry shampoo before and after working out to keep the freshness going strong. Simply shake the can thoroughly, section your hair, and spray at the roots from about 12 inches away. Then, use your fingertips to massage the dry shampoo into your hair before you brush and style. And voila! Hair confidence, even on workout days.
